extensionDescription.message: ThunderAI Sparks is an experimental add-on for Thunderbird, designed to add advanced features to ThunderAI.

prefsInfoDesc_1.message: ThunderAI Sparks is an experimental add-on for Thunderbird, designed to add advanced features to ThunderAI. To use this add-on you need to install ThunderAI.

prefsInfoDesc_2.message: Get ThunderAI from the Thunderbird Add-ons page!

TranslateText.message: Do you want to help translate ThunderAI and ThunderAI Sparks?
